channel.title: CVE Feed for Custom Menu Plugin -- all
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Custom Menu Plugin -- all products

item.title: CVE-2021-38321|2024-09-17T04:24:22.049Z -- custom%20menu%20plugin -- custom%20menu%20plugin
item.description: The Custom Menu Plugin WordPress plugin is vulnerable to Reflected Cross-Site Scripting via the selected_menu parameter found in the ~/custom-menus.php file which allows attackers to inject arbitrary web scripts, in versions up to and including 1.3.3.
